h2. My Info

{{html:
<hr>
<form class="form-horizontal" ng-controller="SettingsController" ng-app="myApp">
<fieldset>

<!-- Form Name -->

<!-- Text input-->
<div class="control-group">
  <label class="control-label" for="textinput">Name</label>
  <div class="controls">
    <input id="textinput" name="textinput" type="text" placeholder="Name" class="input-xlarge" ng-model="settings.name">
    
  </div>
</div>

<!-- Text input-->
<div class="control-group">
  <label class="control-label" for="textinput">E-mail</label>
  <div class="controls">
    <input id="textinput" name="textinput" type="email" placeholder="Email" class="input-xlarge" ng-model="settings.email"
      patterm="^[a-zA-Z0-9.!#$%&'*+/=?^_`{|}~-]+@[a-zA-Z0-9-]+(?:\.[a-zA-Z0-9-]+)+$" >
    
  </div>
</div>
<div class="control-group">
  <label class="control-label" for="passwordinput">Password</label>
  <div class="controls">
    <input id="passwordinput" name="passwordinput" type="password" placeholder="xxxxxxx" class="input-xlarge" ng-model="password">
    
  </div>
</div>
<hr>


<div class="form-actions">
  <button class="btn btn-info btn-large " ng-click="save()" >Save</button> 
</div>

</fieldset>
</form>
}}
